pr_title: CardViewer: Add Help for missing images

timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
CardViewer: Add Help for missing images

Many users had problems with missing images due to a media sync not completing

This gives them advice, and hopefully reduces the support load

Implements a Snackbar in the CardViewer which does not obscure the answer buttons

https://github.com/ankidroid/Anki-Android/wiki/FAQ#why-doesnt-my-sound-or-image-work-on-ankidroid

Fixes 7009

timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.bodyText: specifying SDK configs in robolectric should produce multiple runs ?, It is like using parameterized tests, you get one run in the default SDK I think and then one in the one you specify? The LanguageUtil test should show it. I guess that is surprising as you'd expect a single config API annotation to get you only one run with only that API, but you get the default API as well?
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText: I was expecting minApi to be a predicate on the current version, causing an ignore if current < minApi rather than including using all versions from minApi to maxApi
